snippet: The overall idea is to give drivers the entertainment and communications features of their smartphones without their needing to pick up the phone while behind the wheel.
abstract: Automakers are introducing connected in-car systems that bring smartphone apps to the dashboard, giving drivers entertainment and communications features of phones without their needing to pick up handsets while behind the wheel; features vary widely depending on how the connection is made between car, phone and driver.
lead_paragraph: The overall idea is to give drivers the entertainment and communications features of their smartphones without their needing to pick up the phone while behind the wheel.

headline.print_headline: Motoring in the Age of the Smartphone: Handsets vs. Dashboards
